root: ^Dr. Waterson: “Ah, you cleared out all those invasive plants!”
^Player: “It was a lot of work, but I think I got them all.”
^Dr. Waterson: “You certainly did. This is a big help for the ecosystem.”
^Dr. Waterson: “Now is another good time to test the water.”
^Dr. Waterson: “It should be looking much better, which will leave us with one more task to do…”
^Dr. Waterson: “Ah, but let’s see how the water is first!”
^Dr. Waterson: "Head back to the water testing area and we’ll take another look.”
^Player: “Okay, I think I’ve got the hang of it now.”
